title: Did I miss out on Mexha Zero Sion

embed.description: Check out all the champs and skins on sale this October! Like previous sales schedules, we're not posting the exact dates for each champ and skin, but they'll all be on sale sometime next month.

body: It does say early October but then again I haven't seen these go on sale...or it may just be me.

replies.body: Don't think so. the "early sales" are usually towards the end of the month and get their own separate news announcement when it happens
